author: Kirsten Korosec
title: Nuro gets OK to test its driverless delivery vehicles on California public roads
description: Autonomous delivery startup Nuro has been granted a permit to begin driverless testing on California’s public roads, paving the way for the company to roll out commercial operations throughout the state. Nuro, which raised $940 million from SoftBank Vision Fu…
content:
Autonomous delivery startup Nuro has been granted a permit to begin driverless testing on California’s public roads, paving the way for the company to roll out commercial operations throughout the state.
Nuro, which raised $940 million from SoftBank Vision F… [+4711 chars]
